alert.note: Alert for Eastern Pima-Southeastern Pinal-Santa Cruz-Western Cochise; Pima-South Central Pinal-Tohono Oodham Nation (Arizona) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued September 28 at 1:01AM MST until September 30 at 7:00PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING THROUGH SATURDAY EVENING FOR STRONG GUSTY SOUTH TO SOUTHWEST WINDS, LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITY AND HIGH TO VERY HIGH FIRE DANGER FOR FIRE WEATHER ZONES 150 AND 151... The National Weather Service in Tucson has issued a Fire Weather Watch, which is in effect from Saturday morning through Saturday evening. * AFFECTED AREA...Fire Weather Zones 150 And 151. * TIMING...11 AM MST Saturday morning through 7 PM MST Saturday evening. * WINDS...South to southwest 20 to 30 mph with gusts to 40 mph. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...10 to 15 percent. * IMPACTS...Any fires that develop or are ongoing will have the potential to spread rapidly. * FOR A DETAILED VIEW OF THE HAZARD AREA...Visit weather.gov/Tucson and click on the Detailed Hazards Icon.
info.instruction: A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for later forecasts and possible Red Flag Warnings. Please advise the appropriate officials or fire crews in the field of the Fire Weather Watch for portions of Southeast Arizona.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Pima-Southeastern Pinal-Santa Cruz-Western Cochise; Pima-South Central Pinal-Tohono Oodham Nation
